alert.note: Alert for Isanti; Kanabec (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 5:42PM CDT until July 19 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Kanabec County in east central Minnesota... Northwestern Isanti County in east central Minnesota... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 542 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Bock, or 15 miles northwest of Cambridge, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Grasston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
